member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.Advisee
member.summary: A student who is being advised

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.Advisee.DegreePlanId
member.summary: ID of student's degree plan (aka, course plan)

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.Advisee.ProgramIds
member.summary: List of the student's enrolled programs

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.Advisee.ApprovalRequested
member.summary: Indicates whether student is awaiting advisor approval

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.Advisee.IsAdvisee
member.summary: This advisee is assigned to the current advisor using the system

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.Advisee.PreferredEmailAddress
member.summary: Preferred email address of Advisee

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.Advisee.EducationalGoal
member.summary: Student's stated educational goal, useful for advising. Such as: BA degree, Certification, New Career (institutionally defined)

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.Advisee.AdvisorIds
member.summary: The IDs of this advisee's advisors

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.Advisee.PersonDisplayName
member.summary: Name that should be used when displaying a advisee's name to advisors based on a client specified Name Address Hierarchy. The hierarchy that is used in calculating this name is defined in the Student Display Name Hierarchy on the SPWP form in Colleague. If no hierarchy is provide on SPWP, this will be null.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.Advisee.CompletedAdvisements
member.summary: List of completed advisements for the student for a given date and time by a given advisor

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.Advisee.PhoneTypesHierarchy
member.summary: Phonetypes hierarchy for student profile

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.Advisee.EmailAddresses
member.summary: All email address of advisee

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.AdviseePreferredEmailAddress
member.summary: An advisee's Preferred Email Address

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.AdviseePreferredEmailAddress.AdviseeId
member.summary: The unique id of the advisee

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.AdviseePreferredEmailAddress.PreferredEmailAddress
member.summary: The preferred email address of the advisee

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.AdviseeSearchCriteria
member.summary: Contains INCOMING advisee search/filter request Search criteria must either contain an AdviseeKeyword or an AdvisorKeyword value of at least 2 characters. It cannot contain both.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.AdviseeSearchCriteria.#ctor
member.summary: Default parameter-less constructor

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.AdviseeSearchCriteria.AdviseeKeyword
member.summary: Used when requesting a search of advisees by name or Id. [last, first middle] or [first middle last] or [last] or [Id] expected. Must contain at least 2 characters when provided.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.AdviseeSearchCriteria.AdvisorKeyword
member.summary: Used when requesting a search of advisees by advisor name or Id. [last, first middle] or [first middle last] or [last] or [Id] expected. Must contain at least 2 characters when provided.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.AdviseeSearchCriteria.IncludeActiveAdviseesOnly
member.summary: Indicates that only the current, active advisees should be returned, excluding former advisees and advisees with future advisement start dates.

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.AdvisingPermissions
member.summary: Permissions that an advisor has with respect to advisees

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.AdvisingPermissions.CanViewAssignedAdvisees
member.summary: Advisor can view their assigned advisees' degree plans

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.AdvisingPermissions.CanReviewAssignedAdvisees
member.summary: Advisor can review their assigned advisees degree plans

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.AdvisingPermissions.CanUpdateAssignedAdvisees
member.summary: Advisor can update their assigned advisees' data

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.AdvisingPermissions.HasFullAccessForAssignedAdvisees
member.summary: Advisor can view, review, and update their assigned advisees' data, and can register assigned advisees for classes

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.AdvisingPermissions.CanViewAnyAdvisee
member.summary: Advisor can view any advisee's degree plan

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.AdvisingPermissions.CanReviewAnyAdvisee
member.summary: Advisor can review any advisee's degree plan

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.AdvisingPermissions.CanUpdateAnyAdvisee
member.summary: Advisor can update any advisee's degree plan

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.AdvisingPermissions.HasFullAccessForAnyAdvisee
member.summary: Advisor can view, review, and update any advisee's degree plan, and can register any advisee for classes

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.AdvisingPermissions.CanCreateStudentAcademicProgram
member.summary: Advisor can create or update student academic programs

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.Advisor.PersonDisplayName
member.summary: Information that should be used when displaying a Advisor's name. The hierarchy that is used in calculating this name is defined in the Advisor Display Name Hierarchy on the SPWP form in Colleague. If no hierarchy is provide on SPWP, PersonDisplayName will be null.

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.CatalogPolicy

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.CatalogPolicy.CurrentCatalogYear
member.summary: The most recent catalog year on the program that does not start in the future

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.CatalogPolicy.StudentCatalogYear
member.summary: The catalog year on the first active StudentProgram for the student

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.DegreePlanPreview

member.summary: Limited degree plan containing only the courses from the sample plan

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.DegreePlanPreview.MergedDegreePlan
member.summary: Contains the student's degree plan merged with the sample degree plan - in a state that is ready to update.

member.summary: Contains information related to previewing a sample degree plan against a student degree plan. Both the limited preview of the plan and a merged student degree plan are included.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.DegreePlanPreview7.Preview
member.summary: Limited degree plan containing only the courses from the sample plan

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.DegreePlanPreview7.MergedDegreePlan
member.summary: Contains the student's degree plan merged with the sample degree plan - in a state that is ready to update.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.DegreePlanPreview7.DegreePlanPreviewCoursesEvaluation
member.summary: This contains the list of all the courses listed in preview degree plan with its evaluation status for the program for which sample plan is loaded. For example: A program has sample plan to load certain course in a term. After this program is evaluated the course could have been applied or not applied or not applied due to min grade. This list have one to one correspondance with course in preview in order to identify its evaluation status.

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.DegreePlanPreviewCourseEvaluationResult
member.summary: This identifies the course displayed in preview degree plan along with its program evaluation status.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.DegreePlanPreviewCourseEvaluationResult.CourseId
member.summary: Limited degree plan containing only the courses from the sample plan

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.DegreePlanPreviewCourseEvaluationResult.TermCode
member.summary: Term in which the course is previewed.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.DegreePlanPreviewCourseEvaluationResult.IsEnrolled
member.summary: This identifies if student is enrolled in course.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.DegreePlanPreviewCourseEvaluationResult.EvaluationStatus
member.summary: Contains the status of the course in preview degree plan. For example: if the course was already applied or was not applied or was not applied due to Min grade failure when sample plan was loaded for particular program.

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.DegreePlanPreviewCourseEvaluationStatusType
member.summary: Used to determine the status of the course in preview degree plan.

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.DegreePlanPreviewCourseEvaluationStatusType.Applied
member.summary: This status is set when the student has taken the course listed in preview degree plan and the course is applied in program's evaluation.

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.DegreePlanPreviewCourseEvaluationStatusType.NonApplied
member.summary: This status is set when the student has not taken the course listed in preview degree plan or student took the course but is not applied in program's evaluation.

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.DegreePlanPreviewCourseEvaluationStatusType.MinGrade
member.summary: This status is set when a course was taken but did not meet Minimum grade in program evaluation.

member.summary: Retrieve all review request without filter
